Name: TicoCoin
Notes: One of the main collectibles in a Galaxy. There should only be one in every proper Galaxy. TubeSliderTicoCoin is a variant to be used on tube slides. It needs to be linked to a proper TubeSlider instance. TubeSliderTicoCoin has a far clipping distance of 300 meters.

Obj_arg0.Name: Initial Angle
Obj_arg0.Description: The angle around the tube slide at which the object gets positioned initially.

Obj_arg1.Name: Edge Offset
Obj_arg1.Description: The offset from the tube's edge at which the object should be placed. Default is 0.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Camera.Description: Uses 出現デモカメラ for appearing.

ScoreAttack.Description: This object scores 1000 points in The Chimp's challenges.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: Continues movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc. However, this only works during the first scenario of JungleGliderGalaxy.
